title: Lol Patcher Doesn't Work
body: Anyone else have this issue suddenly? I've done literally nothing to my computer, played before I went to sleep last night and now my patcher won't work at all this morning. I try to open league and nothing happens a window just come up saying the Patcher has stopped working.

replies.body:
Hey Mageofpie,

Can you try running the client using lol.launcher.admin.exe from your League of Legends folder?
